sentences.english: Like Yubari, Japan is heading into a demographic vortex.
sentences.chinese: 夕张市是一个写照，整个日本正陷入人口问题的漩涡。

sentences.english: The coordination between skylight time and operation of evening-morning train is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了夕发朝至列车与天窗时间和天窗方式的协调。

sentences.english: The people of the our country have the custom of" autumn month" in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 我国人民在古代就有“秋暮夕月”的习俗。

sentences.english: " Where "yuzuki" is on the meaning of worship.
sentences.chinese: 这里的“夕月”就是拜月的意思。

sentences.english: Japan is already full of Yubaris.
sentences.chinese: 整个日本都已经夕张化了。

sentences.english: Yuzuki, that is, worship goddess of the moon.
Like Yubari, Japan is also deeply in debt.
sentences.chinese: 正如同夕张市面临的情况一样，日本也负债累累。
